values.en:
Your Company ("we", "Your Company" or "Company") is offering you the opportunity to refer friends via a Referral Program ("Program") offered on the web site located at Your Company (the "Site").

  1. Binding Agreement. By using the Site or participating in the Program, you are bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms") and indicate your agreement to them. All of the Company's decisions are final and binding.

  2. Privacy. The personal information collected, processed and used as part of the Program will be used in accordance with Company's Privacy Statement, which is available by link on the Site.

  3. How the Program Works. You must be a legal resident of the United States of America and at least 18 years old to use the Site. Next, you must visit the Site and follow the on-screen instructions to refer friends, family members or colleagues. Users may refer a maximum of 25 friends, family members or colleagues during each session and a maximum of 500 times throughout the entirety of the Program. Once an individual makes a referral, he/she becomes a "Referrer" and will be provided with a unique referral link ("Personal Link") that allows her to receive the benefit or reward advertised on the Site. Referred friends ("Friends") must complete the referral as described in the referral message.

  4. Restrictions. Referrers cannot refer themselves or create multiple, fictitious or fake accounts with the Company or participate in the Program as "Friends". No user may use the Program to violate any law, infringe or violate the rights of any third party, or otherwise act in a manner that is deemed harassing, harmful, illegal, hateful, obscene or outside the spirit and intent of the Program. In addition, you may not (i) tamper with the Program, (ii) act in an unfair or disruptive manner, or (iii) use any system, bot or other device or artifice to participate or receive any benefit in the Program. CAUTION: ANY ATTEMPT TO DELIBERATELY DAMAGE OR UNDERMINE THE LEGITIMATE OPERATION OF THE PROGRAM MAY BE IN VIOLATION OF CRIMINAL AND CIVIL LAWS. SHOULD SUCH AN ATTEMPT BE MADE, THE COMPANY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO SEEK REMEDIES AND DAMAGES (INCLUDING ATTORNEY FEES) TO THE FULLEST EXTENT OF THE LAW, INCLUDING CRIMINAL PROSECUTION.

    Employees of the Company or any of its or their subsidiaries, affiliates or promotional agencies are not able to participate.

  5. Rewards. By making a valid referral, you will receive $20 and your Friend will receive $20. You can earn an amount from these rewards per year that does not exceed the IRS de minimis threshold for third-party payment platforms. These rewards may be redeemed in various forms in the Company's sole discretion. Restrictions may apply. For example, there may be a limitation on the number of referrals you can make, or if the reward is in the form of a gift card, gift certificate or voucher, it may be subject to the issuer's terms and conditions. Rewards are subject to verification. The Company may delay a reward for the purposes of investigation. The Company may also refuse to verify and process any transaction for any reason.

    Unless otherwise stated, rewards have no monetary value and may not be redeemed for cash. They are not transferable and may not be auctioned, traded, bartered or sold.

  6. Liability. YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT THE RELEASED PARTIES SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, GOODWILL, USE, DATA OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES (EVEN IF THE COMPANY WAS ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES). By participating in the Program, you agree to defend, indemnify, release and hold harmless the Company, Extole, Inc., as the provider of the referral service, and their respective parent companies, affiliates and subsidiaries, together with their respective employees, directors, officers, licensees, licensors, shareholders, attorneys and agents including, without limitation, their respective advertising and promotion entities and any person or entity associated with the production, operation or administration of the Program (collectively, the "Released Parties"), from any and all claims, actions, demands, damages, losses, liabilities, costs or expenses caused by, arising out of, in connection with, or related to the Program (including, without limitation, any property loss, damage, personal injury or death caused to any person(s)) and/or the awarding, receipt and/or use or misuse of any benefit in the Program. To be clear, the Released Parties shall not be liable for any technical errors or malfunctions, data theft or corruption, any printing or typographical error, or any damage to any computer system resulting from participating in, or accessing or downloading information in connection with the Program. The Released Parties shall not be liable to any users for failure to supply any advertised benefit, by reason of any acts of God, any action or request by any governmental or quasi-governmental entity (whether or not valid), or any other activity or action that is beyond any of the Released Parties' control. TO THE FULLEST EXTENT POSSIBLE BY LAW, THE RELEASED PARTIES' MAXIMUM LIABILITY ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE PROGRAM, REGARDLESS OF THE CAUSE OF ACTION (WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT, BREACH OF WARRANTY, OR OTHERWISE), WILL NOT EXCEED $100.

  7. Disclaimer of Warranties. YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT: (A) THE PROGRAM IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS AND THE COMPANY EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, CONDITIONS AND TERMS OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED BY STATUTE, COMMON LAW OR CUSTOM, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES AS TO PRODUCTS OR SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH THE USE OF THE PROGRAM, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, SATISFACTORY QUALITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT; (B) THE RELEASED PARTIES MAKE AND GIVE NO WARRANTY THAT (i) THE PROGRAM WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, (ii) THE PROGRAM WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE, OR ERROR-FREE, AND (iii) THE QUALITY OF ANY PRODUCTS, SERVICES, INFORMATION, OR OTHER MATERIAL OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE PROGRAM WILL MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS, AND (C) ANY MATERIAL DOWNLOADED OR OTHERWISE OBTAINED THROUGH THE USE OF THE PROGRAM IS ACCESSED AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION AND RISK, AND YOU WILL BE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGE TO YOUR COMPUTER SYSTEM OR MOBILE DEVICE OR LOSS OF DATA THAT RESULTS FROM THE DOWNLOAD OR USE OF ANY SUCH MATERIAL.

  8. Bulk Distribution ("Spam"). Each Referrer is the actual sender of the emails and must comply with applicable law. Referrals must be created and distributed in a personal manner that is appropriate and customary for communications with friends, colleagues and family members. By submitting any email address as part of the Program, the Referrer represents that he/she has the appropriate permission and consent. Bulk email distribution, distribution to strangers, or any other use of the services described herein in a manner that is not promoted is expressly prohibited and may be grounds for immediate termination and further legal action. The Company has no obligation to monitor the Program or any communications; however, the Company may choose to do so and block any email messages, remove any such content, or prohibit any use of the Program. Referrers who do not comply with the law, including anti-spam laws, are obligated to indemnify the Program Entities against any liabilities, costs and expenses it incurs as a result of such spam.

  9. Sign-In Credentials. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any sign-in credentials and are fully responsible for all activities that occur through the use of them. Users agree to notify the Company immediately if they suspect unauthorized access to their account. Users agree that the Company will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from unauthorized use of their credentials.

  10. Right to Cancel, Modify or Terminate. We reserve the right to cancel, modify or terminate the Program at any time for any reason. We reserve the right to disqualify any User at any time from participation in the Program if he/she does not comply with any of these Terms.

values.en: Refer a friend and you'll both get rewarded!
values.es: ¡Recomienda a un amigo y ambos serán recompensados!
values.fr: Parraine un(e) ami(e) et nous bénéficierons ensemble d'une réduction.

values.en:
Your Company ("we", "Your Company" or "Company") is offering you the opportunity to refer friends via a Referral Program ("Program") offered on the web site located at Your Company (the "Site").

  1. Binding Agreement. By using the Site or participating in the Program, you are bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms") and indicate your agreement to them. All of the Company's decisions are final and binding.

  2. Privacy. The personal information collected, processed and used as part of the Program will be used in accordance with Company's Privacy Statement, which is available by link on the Site.

  3. How the Program Works. You must be a legal resident of the United States of America and at least 18 years old to use the Site. Next, you must visit the Site and follow the on-screen instructions to refer friends, family members or colleagues. Users may refer a maximum of 25 friends, family members or colleagues during each session and a maximum of 500 times throughout the entirety of the Program. Once an individual makes a referral, he/she becomes a "Referrer" and will be provided with a unique referral link ("Personal Link") that allows her to receive the benefit or reward advertised on the Site. Referred friends ("Friends") must complete the referral as described in the referral message.

  4. Restrictions. Referrers cannot refer themselves or create multiple, fictitious or fake accounts with the Company or participate in the Program as "Friends". No user may use the Program to violate any law, infringe or violate the rights of any third party, or otherwise act in a manner that is deemed harassing, harmful, illegal, hateful, obscene or outside the spirit and intent of the Program. In addition, you may not (i) tamper with the Program, (ii) act in an unfair or disruptive manner, or (iii) use any system, bot or other device or artifice to participate or receive any benefit in the Program. CAUTION: ANY ATTEMPT TO DELIBERATELY DAMAGE OR UNDERMINE THE LEGITIMATE OPERATION OF THE PROGRAM MAY BE IN VIOLATION OF CRIMINAL AND CIVIL LAWS. SHOULD SUCH AN ATTEMPT BE MADE, THE COMPANY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO SEEK REMEDIES AND DAMAGES (INCLUDING ATTORNEY FEES) TO THE FULLEST EXTENT OF THE LAW, INCLUDING CRIMINAL PROSECUTION.

    Employees of the Company or any of its or their subsidiaries, affiliates or promotional agencies are not able to participate.

  5. Rewards. By making a valid referral, you will receive $20 and your Friend will receive $20. You can earn an amount from these rewards per year that does not exceed the IRS de minimis threshold for third-party payment platforms. These rewards may be redeemed in various forms in the Company's sole discretion. Restrictions may apply. For example, there may be a limitation on the number of referrals you can make, or if the reward is in the form of a gift card, gift certificate or voucher, it may be subject to the issuer's terms and conditions. Rewards are subject to verification. The Company may delay a reward for the purposes of investigation. The Company may also refuse to verify and process any transaction for any reason.

    Unless otherwise stated, rewards have no monetary value and may not be redeemed for cash. They are not transferable and may not be auctioned, traded, bartered or sold.

  6. Liability. YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT THE RELEASED PARTIES SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, GOODWILL, USE, DATA OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES (EVEN IF THE COMPANY WAS ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES). By participating in the Program, you agree to defend, indemnify, release and hold harmless the Company, Extole, Inc., as the provider of the referral service, and their respective parent companies, affiliates and subsidiaries, together with their respective employees, directors, officers, licensees, licensors, shareholders, attorneys and agents including, without limitation, their respective advertising and promotion entities and any person or entity associated with the production, operation or administration of the Program (collectively, the "Released Parties"), from any and all claims, actions, demands, damages, losses, liabilities, costs or expenses caused by, arising out of, in connection with, or related to the Program (including, without limitation, any property loss, damage, personal injury or death caused to any person(s)) and/or the awarding, receipt and/or use or misuse of any benefit in the Program. To be clear, the Released Parties shall not be liable for any technical errors or malfunctions, data theft or corruption, any printing or typographical error, or any damage to any computer system resulting from participating in, or accessing or downloading information in connection with the Program. The Released Parties shall not be liable to any users for failure to supply any advertised benefit, by reason of any acts of God, any action or request by any governmental or quasi-governmental entity (whether or not valid), or any other activity or action that is beyond any of the Released Parties' control. TO THE FULLEST EXTENT POSSIBLE BY LAW, THE RELEASED PARTIES' MAXIMUM LIABILITY ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE PROGRAM, REGARDLESS OF THE CAUSE OF ACTION (WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT, BREACH OF WARRANTY, OR OTHERWISE), WILL NOT EXCEED $100.

  7. Disclaimer of Warranties. YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT: (A) THE PROGRAM IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS AND THE COMPANY EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, CONDITIONS AND TERMS OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED BY STATUTE, COMMON LAW OR CUSTOM, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES AS TO PRODUCTS OR SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH THE USE OF THE PROGRAM, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, SATISFACTORY QUALITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT; (B) THE RELEASED PARTIES MAKE AND GIVE NO WARRANTY THAT (i) THE PROGRAM WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, (ii) THE PROGRAM WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE, OR ERROR-FREE, AND (iii) THE QUALITY OF ANY PRODUCTS, SERVICES, INFORMATION, OR OTHER MATERIAL OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE PROGRAM WILL MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS, AND (C) ANY MATERIAL DOWNLOADED OR OTHERWISE OBTAINED THROUGH THE USE OF THE PROGRAM IS ACCESSED AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION AND RISK, AND YOU WILL BE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGE TO YOUR COMPUTER SYSTEM OR MOBILE DEVICE OR LOSS OF DATA THAT RESULTS FROM THE DOWNLOAD OR USE OF ANY SUCH MATERIAL.

  8. Bulk Distribution ("Spam"). Each Referrer is the actual sender of the emails and must comply with applicable law. Referrals must be created and distributed in a personal manner that is appropriate and customary for communications with friends, colleagues and family members. By submitting any email address as part of the Program, the Referrer represents that he/she has the appropriate permission and consent. Bulk email distribution, distribution to strangers, or any other use of the services described herein in a manner that is not promoted is expressly prohibited and may be grounds for immediate termination and further legal action. The Company has no obligation to monitor the Program or any communications; however, the Company may choose to do so and block any email messages, remove any such content, or prohibit any use of the Program. Referrers who do not comply with the law, including anti-spam laws, are obligated to indemnify the Program Entities against any liabilities, costs and expenses it incurs as a result of such spam.

  9. Sign-In Credentials. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any sign-in credentials and are fully responsible for all activities that occur through the use of them. Users agree to notify the Company immediately if they suspect unauthorized access to their account. Users agree that the Company will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from unauthorized use of their credentials.

  10. Right to Cancel, Modify or Terminate. We reserve the right to cancel, modify or terminate the Program at any time for any reason. We reserve the right to disqualify any User at any time from participation in the Program if he/she does not comply with any of these Terms.

values.es: Programa de referencias de Your Company

values.en: Refer Your Friends and Get $20 per pal
values.es: Recomienda a tus amigos y obtén $20 de descuento por cada compra que ellos hagan
values.fr: Parraine un(e) ami(e) et bénéficie de $20 de réduction!

values.en: The more you give, the more you get.
values.fr: Plus vous en donnez, plus vous en obtenez.

values.en:
Sharing the love is easy! Here's how:
  1. Share with friends via Facebook, X, or email.
  2. Your friends get $20 off their first order.
  3. You'll get $20 credit in your account when your friend places their first order. Cha-ching!
values.es:
¡Compartir el amor es fácil! Así es cómo:
  1. Comparte con amigos a través de Facebook, X o correo electrónico.
  2. Sus amigos reciben $20 de su primer pedido.
  3. Obtendrá el crédito $20 en su cuenta cuando su amigo realice su primer pedido. Cha-ching!
values.fr:
Partager l'amour est facile! Voici comment:
  1. Partagez avec vos amis via Facebook, X ou par e-mail.
  2. $20 de remise à la premiere commande de vos amis.
  3. Le solde de votre compte augmentera dès leur transaction. Bingo!

values.en:
Your Company ("we", "Your Company" or "Company") is offering you the opportunity to refer friends via a Referral Program ("Program") offered on the web site located at Your Company (the "Site").

  1. Binding Agreement. By using the Site or participating in the Program, you are bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms") and indicate your agreement to them. All of the Company's decisions are final and binding.

  2. Privacy. The personal information collected, processed and used as part of the Program will be used in accordance with Company's Privacy Statement, which is available by link on the Site.

  3. How the Program Works. You must be a legal resident of the United States of America and at least 18 years old to use the Site. Next, you must visit the Site and follow the on-screen instructions to refer friends, family members or colleagues. Users may refer a maximum of 25 friends, family members or colleagues during each session and a maximum of 500 times throughout the entirety of the Program. Once an individual makes a referral, he/she becomes a "Referrer" and will be provided with a unique referral link ("Personal Link") that allows her to receive the benefit or reward advertised on the Site. Referred friends ("Friends") must complete the referral as described in the referral message.

  4. Restrictions. Referrers cannot refer themselves or create multiple, fictitious or fake accounts with the Company or participate in the Program as "Friends". No user may use the Program to violate any law, infringe or violate the rights of any third party, or otherwise act in a manner that is deemed harassing, harmful, illegal, hateful, obscene or outside the spirit and intent of the Program. In addition, you may not (i) tamper with the Program, (ii) act in an unfair or disruptive manner, or (iii) use any system, bot or other device or artifice to participate or receive any benefit in the Program. CAUTION: ANY ATTEMPT TO DELIBERATELY DAMAGE OR UNDERMINE THE LEGITIMATE OPERATION OF THE PROGRAM MAY BE IN VIOLATION OF CRIMINAL AND CIVIL LAWS. SHOULD SUCH AN ATTEMPT BE MADE, THE COMPANY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO SEEK REMEDIES AND DAMAGES (INCLUDING ATTORNEY FEES) TO THE FULLEST EXTENT OF THE LAW, INCLUDING CRIMINAL PROSECUTION.

    Employees of the Company or any of its or their subsidiaries, affiliates or promotional agencies are not able to participate.

  5. Rewards. By making a valid referral, you will receive $20 and your Friend will receive $20. You can earn an amount from these rewards per year that does not exceed the IRS de minimis threshold for third-party payment platforms. These rewards may be redeemed in various forms in the Company's sole discretion. Restrictions may apply. For example, there may be a limitation on the number of referrals you can make, or if the reward is in the form of a gift card, gift certificate or voucher, it may be subject to the issuer's terms and conditions. Rewards are subject to verification. The Company may delay a reward for the purposes of investigation. The Company may also refuse to verify and process any transaction for any reason.

    Unless otherwise stated, rewards have no monetary value and may not be redeemed for cash. They are not transferable and may not be auctioned, traded, bartered or sold.

  6. Liability. YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT THE RELEASED PARTIES SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, GOODWILL, USE, DATA OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES (EVEN IF THE COMPANY WAS ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES). By participating in the Program, you agree to defend, indemnify, release and hold harmless the Company, Extole, Inc., as the provider of the referral service, and their respective parent companies, affiliates and subsidiaries, together with their respective employees, directors, officers, licensees, licensors, shareholders, attorneys and agents including, without limitation, their respective advertising and promotion entities and any person or entity associated with the production, operation or administration of the Program (collectively, the "Released Parties"), from any and all claims, actions, demands, damages, losses, liabilities, costs or expenses caused by, arising out of, in connection with, or related to the Program (including, without limitation, any property loss, damage, personal injury or death caused to any person(s)) and/or the awarding, receipt and/or use or misuse of any benefit in the Program. To be clear, the Released Parties shall not be liable for any technical errors or malfunctions, data theft or corruption, any printing or typographical error, or any damage to any computer system resulting from participating in, or accessing or downloading information in connection with the Program. The Released Parties shall not be liable to any users for failure to supply any advertised benefit, by reason of any acts of God, any action or request by any governmental or quasi-governmental entity (whether or not valid), or any other activity or action that is beyond any of the Released Parties' control. TO THE FULLEST EXTENT POSSIBLE BY LAW, THE RELEASED PARTIES' MAXIMUM LIABILITY ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE PROGRAM, REGARDLESS OF THE CAUSE OF ACTION (WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT, BREACH OF WARRANTY, OR OTHERWISE), WILL NOT EXCEED $100.

  7. Disclaimer of Warranties. YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT: (A) THE PROGRAM IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS AND THE COMPANY EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, CONDITIONS AND TERMS OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED BY STATUTE, COMMON LAW OR CUSTOM, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES AS TO PRODUCTS OR SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH THE USE OF THE PROGRAM, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, SATISFACTORY QUALITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT; (B) THE RELEASED PARTIES MAKE AND GIVE NO WARRANTY THAT (i) THE PROGRAM WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, (ii) THE PROGRAM WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE, OR ERROR-FREE, AND (iii) THE QUALITY OF ANY PRODUCTS, SERVICES, INFORMATION, OR OTHER MATERIAL OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE PROGRAM WILL MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS, AND (C) ANY MATERIAL DOWNLOADED OR OTHERWISE OBTAINED THROUGH THE USE OF THE PROGRAM IS ACCESSED AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION AND RISK, AND YOU WILL BE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGE TO YOUR COMPUTER SYSTEM OR MOBILE DEVICE OR LOSS OF DATA THAT RESULTS FROM THE DOWNLOAD OR USE OF ANY SUCH MATERIAL.

  8. Bulk Distribution ("Spam"). Each Referrer is the actual sender of the emails and must comply with applicable law. Referrals must be created and distributed in a personal manner that is appropriate and customary for communications with friends, colleagues and family members. By submitting any email address as part of the Program, the Referrer represents that he/she has the appropriate permission and consent. Bulk email distribution, distribution to strangers, or any other use of the services described herein in a manner that is not promoted is expressly prohibited and may be grounds for immediate termination and further legal action. The Company has no obligation to monitor the Program or any communications; however, the Company may choose to do so and block any email messages, remove any such content, or prohibit any use of the Program. Referrers who do not comply with the law, including anti-spam laws, are obligated to indemnify the Program Entities against any liabilities, costs and expenses it incurs as a result of such spam.

  9. Sign-In Credentials. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any sign-in credentials and are fully responsible for all activities that occur through the use of them. Users agree to notify the Company immediately if they suspect unauthorized access to their account. Users agree that the Company will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from unauthorized use of their credentials.

  10. Right to Cancel, Modify or Terminate. We reserve the right to cancel, modify or terminate the Program at any time for any reason. We reserve the right to disqualify any User at any time from participation in the Program if he/she does not comply with any of these Terms.

No user may use the Program to violate any law, infringe or violate the rights of any third party, or otherwise act in a manner that is deemed harassing, harmful, illegal, hateful, obscene or outside the spirit and intent of the Program.   5. Rewards. By making a valid referral, you will receive $20 and your Friend will receive $20. You can earn an amount from these rewards per year that does not exceed the IRS de minimis threshold for third-party payment platforms. These rewards may be redeemed in various forms in the Company's sole discretion. Restrictions may apply. For example, there may be a limitation on the number of referrals you can make, or if the reward is in the form of a gift card, gift certificate or voucher, it may be subject to the issuer's terms and conditions. Rewards are subject to verification. The Company may delay a reward for the purposes of investigation. The Company may also refuse to verify and process any transaction for any reason.

values.en: Thanks for shopping with Your Company
values.es: Gracias por comprar con Your Company
values.fr: Merci de faire vos achats chez Your Company

values.en: Thanks for shopping with Your Company
values.es: Gracias por comprar con Your Company
values.fr: Merci de faire vos achats chez Your Company

values.en: Thanks for shopping with Your Company
values.es: Gracias por comprar con Your Company
values.fr: Merci de faire vos achats chez Your Company

values.en: You're on your way to getting $20!
values.fr: Tu es sur le point de récupérer ta récompense !

values.en:
Here is what needs to happen next for you to claim your reward:
  • You need to open an account and make your first purchase
  • The purchase cannot be canceled or returned
  • Keep in mind, you can receive a maximum of 10 referrals, which can total up to $500.00 per calendar year.

Once all the above conditions are met, you can expect your $20 to be delivered to your inbox within the next 30 days. Spread the word and keep boosting your rewards!
values.es:
Aquí está lo que tiene que suceder para que puedas reclamar tu recompensa:
  • Necesitas abrir una cuenta y hacer tu primera compra
  • La compra no puede ser cancelada ni devuelta
  • Recuerda, puedes recibir un máximo de 10 referencias, que pueden sumar hasta $500.00 por año calendario.

Una vez que se cumplan todas las condiciones anteriores, puedes esperar que tu $20 llegue a tu bandeja de entrada en los próximos 30 días. ¡Corre la voz y sigue aumentando tus recompensas!
values.fr:
Voici ce qui doit se passer ensuite pour que vous puissiez réclamer votre récompense :
  • Vous devez ouvrir un compte et effectuer votre premier achat
  • L'achat ne peut être annulé ni retourné
  • Gardez à l'esprit que vous pouvez recevoir un maximum de 10 références, pouvant totaliser jusqu'à 500,00 $ par année civile.

Une fois toutes les conditions ci-dessus remplies, vous pouvez vous attendre à ce que votre $20 soit livré dans votre boîte de réception dans les 30 prochains jours. Passez le mot et continuez à augmenter vos récompenses!

values.en: Keep earning rewards - refer your friends!
values.es: Sigue ganando recompensas - ¡refiere a tus amigos!
values.fr: Continuez à gagner des récompenses - parrainez vos amis!
Continuez à partager avec vos amis !

values.en: Thanks for referring your friend to Your Company
values.es: Gracias por referir a tu amigo a Your Company
values.fr: Merci d'avoir recommandé votre ami à Your Company

values.es: Gracias por referir a tu amigo

values.en: Thanks for referring your friend to Your Company
values.es: Gracias por referir a tu amigo a Your Company
values.fr: Merci d'avoir recommandé votre ami à Your Company
Vous êtes sur la bonne voie pour gagner $20 !

values.en:
Here is what needs to happen next for you to claim your reward:
  • Your friend needs to become a new Your Company customer
  • They must open an account and make their first purchase
  • This purchase cannot be canceled or returned
  • Remember, you can earn up to $500 in referrals per calendar year

Once these conditions are met, you can expect your $20 reward to hit your inbox within the next 30 days. We're thrilled to have you spreading the word about Your Company and appreciate your efforts!
values.es:
Aquí está lo que tiene que suceder para que puedas reclamar tu recompensa:
  • Tu amigo necesita convertirse en un nuevo cliente de Your Company
  • Deben abrir una cuenta y realizar su primera compra
  • Esta compra no puede ser cancelada ni devuelta
  • Recuerda, puedes ganar hasta $500 en referencias por año calendario

Una vez que se cumplan estas condiciones, puedes esperar que tu recompensa de $20 llegue a tu bandeja de entrada en los próximos 30 días. ¡Estamos emocionados de que estés difundiendo la palabra sobre Your Company y apreciamos tus esfuerzos!
values.fr:
Voici ce qui doit se passer ensuite pour que vous puissiez réclamer votre récompense :
  • Votre ami doit devenir un nouveau client de Your Company
  • Il doit ouvrir un compte et effectuer son premier achat
  • Cet achat ne peut être annulé ni retourné
  • Rappelez-vous, vous pouvez gagner jusqu'à 500 $ en parrainages par année civile

Une fois ces conditions remplies, vous pouvez vous attendre à recevoir votre récompense de $20 dans votre boîte de réception dans les 30 prochains jours. Nous sommes ravis que vous partagiez votre enthousiasme pour Your Company et nous apprécions vos efforts !

values.en: Keep earning rewards - refer your friends!
values.es: No lo olvides: cuanto más refieras, más ganas.
values.fr: N'oublie pas - plus tu parraines d'amis, plus tu gagnes de récompenses !
Continuez à partager avec vos amis !

triggers.trigger_name: Is first friend sign up reward

triggers.expression: javascript@runtime:function() { var email = context.causeEvent.data['recipient']; var currentProgramLabel = context.causeEvent.data['labels']; var friendSteps = context.getGlobalServices().personService.lookupPerson().withEmail(email).lookup().getSteps(); for (var i = 0; i < friendSteps.length; i++) { if (friendSteps[i].stepName === 'outcome' && friendSteps[i].programLabel === currentProgramLabel) { context.log('Friend has already reached outcome step in program, not moving forward with schedule remind email'); return false; } } return true; }()

metrics.name: Impressions
metrics.description: Number of impressions on in-app or onsite promotions or Extole-sent emails that have been opened (does not include links posted on social channels or untracked sources)

metrics.name: Reach
metrics.description: Unique people viewing in-app or onsite promotions or emails (does not include links posted on social channels or untracked sources)

metrics.name: Authentication Email Triggers
metrics.description: Number of times the Authentication Email was triggered

metrics.name: Unique Authentication Email Triggers
metrics.description: Unique people to whom a Authentication Email was triggered

metrics.name: Promotion Click-Throughs
metrics.description: Number of clicks on in-app promotions, onsite promotions, email promotions, or promotion links posted on social channels

metrics.name: Unique Promotion Clicks
metrics.description: Unique people clicking on in-app promotions, onsite promotions, email promotions, or promotion links posted on social channels

metrics.name: Promotion Click-Through Rate
metrics.description: (Promotion clicks/Impressions) * 100. Promotion Click-Through Rate is the ratio of clicks on promotions to impressions on promotions (impressions do not include links posted on social channels or untracked sources).

metrics.name: Unique Promotion Click-Through Rate
metrics.description: (Unique promotion clicks/Reach) * 100. Unique Promotion Click-Through Rate is the ratio of unique people clicking on promotions to unique people viewing promotions (reach does not include links posted on social channels or untracked sources).

metrics.name: Authentication Email Deliveries
metrics.description: Number of times the Authentication Email was delivered

metrics.name: Unique Authentication Email Deliveries
metrics.description: Unique people to whom a Authentication Email was delivered

metrics.name: Authentication Email Delivery Rate
metrics.description: (Authentication Email Delivered /Authentication Email Triggered) * 100. Authentication Email Delivery Rate is the ratio of deliveries of Authentication Emails to triggers of Authentication Emails.

metrics.name: Unique Authentication Email Delivery Rate
metrics.description: (Unique Authentication Email deliveries/Unique Authentication Email triggers) * 100. Unique Authentication Email Delivery Rate is the ratio of unique people to whom a Authentication Email was delivered to unique people to whom a Authentication Email was triggered.

metrics.description: Number of rewards issued to friends

flow_steps.name: Friend Rewarded

metrics.name: Conversions
metrics.description: Number of conversions

metrics.name: Converters
metrics.description: Unique customers

metrics.name: Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (Conversions/Share clicks) * 100. Conversion Rate is the ratio of conversions to clicks on share links.

metrics.name: Unique Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (Converters/Unique share clicks) * 100. Unique Conversion Rate is the ratio of unique customers to unique people clicking on a share.

metrics.name: Highest Quality Conversions
metrics.description: Number of highest quality conversions

metrics.name: Friend Conversion Reward Rate
metrics.description: (Rewarded conversions/Conversions) * 100. Conversion Reward Rate is the ratio of conversions that have resulted in an advocate reward to total conversions.

metrics.name: Value of Rewarded Conversions
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all conversions that have resulted in an advocate reward

metrics.name: Conversion Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from conversions

metrics.name: New to File Conversion Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all conversions that are new to your customer list

metrics.name: Friend Rewarded Friend Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that resulted in a friend reward

metrics.name: Friend Redeemed Reward Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that used a friend reward

metrics.name: Highest Quality Friend Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all highest quality conversions

metrics.name: New to File Friend Conversions
metrics.description: Number of conversions that are new to your customer list

metrics.name: Rewarded Friend Conversions
metrics.description: Number of friend conversions that have resulted in an advocate reward

metrics.name: Highest Quality Friend Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (Highest quality friend conversions/Highest quality share clicks) * 100. Highest Quality Friend Conversion Rate is the ratio of friend conversions that are highest quality to clicks on share links that are highest quality.

metrics.name: New to File Friend Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (New to file friend conversions/Share clicks) * 100. New to File Friend Conversion Rate is the ratio of friend conversions that are new to file to clicks on share links.

flow_steps.name: Friend Converted

metrics.name: Advocate Rewards
metrics.description: Number of rewards issued to advocates

metrics.name: Advocates Rewarded
metrics.description: Unique people receiving an advocate reward

metrics.name: Advocate Rewarded Friend Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that resulted in an advocate reward

metrics.name: Advocate Redeemed Reward Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that used an advocate reward

metrics.name: Advocate Redeemed Rewards
metrics.description: Number of rewards redeemed by advocates

metrics.name: Advocate Reward Redemption Rate
metrics.description: (Redeemed advocate rewards/Advocate rewards) * 100. Advocate Reward Redemption Rate is the ratio of rewards redeemed by advocates to rewards issued to advocates.
